item.title: Palworld is getting a frog with a stick (and 3 other new Pals) | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: Image: Pocketpair I only care about the tall mushroom one Spring has sprung and that means new creatures coming to the chaotic, monster-filled lands of Palworld. Developer Pocketpair revealed four ne...
item.content:encoded: Image: Pocketpair I only care about the tall mushroom one Spring has sprung and that means new creatures coming to the chaotic, monster-filled lands of Palworld. Developer Pocketpair revealed four new Pals heading to the hit survival monster-catching game on Monday. The brief trailer showed four new Pals that will join the growing roster of creatures in the game. Pocketpair did not share a release date for the new Pals. There are four new creatures in total: a frog, an ostrich, an anthropomorph...

item.description: Photo: Nintendo Despite a lack of official details, the successor to the popular handheld hybrid is taking shape Nintendo, notoriously secretive, has so far said nothing ‚Äî or almost nothing ‚Äî on the...
item.content:encoded: Photo: Nintendo Despite a lack of official details, the successor to the popular handheld hybrid is taking shape Nintendo, notoriously secretive, has so far said nothing ‚Äî or almost nothing ‚Äî on the record about its next game console. As Nintendo Switch approaches its seventh birthday in March 2024, questions about how much longer it will last are natural: Seven years is a typical lifespan for a console generation, Switch sales are falling fast, and the technology powering the console is showi...

item.title: Sounds like the Switch 2 has Joy-Cons that attach magnetically | Polygon - Gaming
item.description: The Pok√©mon Company/Nintendo Backward compatibility for both games and controllers reported, too A pair of recent reports have suggested that Nintendo‚Äôs successor to the Switch console ‚Äî which we, a...
item.content:encoded: The Pok√©mon Company/Nintendo Backward compatibility for both games and controllers reported, too A pair of recent reports have suggested that Nintendo‚Äôs successor to the Switch console ‚Äî which we, along with everyone else, are calling Switch 2 for now ‚Äî will have Joy-Con controllers that attach to the body of the device using strong, electronically-controlled magnets, rather than the sliding rail system used by the Switch. The news was first broken by Vandal, a Spanish site with a fairly good ...

item.description: Image: Moon Studios/Private Division Moon Studios takes a big swing, and early access shows promise No Rest for the Wicked is tedious by design. Healing items in the action RPG have a 10-second hold...
item.content:encoded: Image: Moon Studios/Private Division Moon Studios takes a big swing, and early access shows promise No Rest for the Wicked is tedious by design. Healing items in the action RPG have a 10-second hold period after use, so you‚Äôre bound to die often. Equipment loses durability each time you die, and the cost of repairs quickly adds up. Bounty missions you take on to cover them pay like shit, but that‚Äôs the job. Over and over, the game punctures any confidence you build over the course of your adve...
